meaningMnemonic: An <kanji>eat</kanji>ing <kanji>hall</kanji> is a big room in which you eat. What big rooms do you eat in? How about a <vocabulary>cafeteria</vocabulary>, a <vocabulary>dining hall</vocabulary>, or a <vocabulary>diner</vocabulary>?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
